name: UNNotificationServiceExtension
desc: An object that modifies the content of a remote notification before it’s delivered to the user.

items.name: func didReceive(UNNotificationRequest, withContentHandler: (UNNotificationContent) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks you to make any needed changes to the notification and notify the system when you’re done.

items.name: func serviceExtensionTimeWillExpire()
items.desc: Tells you that the system is terminating your extension.
